title: Chris's Aioli
ingredients: ['1 whole egg', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, a generous teaspoon I am told', 'a little salt, there is a note on the recipe saying CAREFUL!', '1 tablespoon lemon juice, a possible tad more to taste', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '150ml (1/4 pint) extra virgin olive oil']
